name: Minus
description: This Pokemon has a natural Negative charge. It will attract Positive charge and repel other negative charge. They are prone to feel blue.
effect: If an ally Pokemon has the ability “Minus” (besides the User) or the ability ”Plus”, Increase the User's base Special by 2. If no ally has Minus or Plus, this Pokemon gains +1 Dexterity at the start of the First Round.
